data.name: Word of the Law: Death Mask Collector's Edition
data.detailed_description:
You're an F.B.I.S.K. detective who investigates particularly serious crimes connected with serial killers. Audrey Parker, a police officer, tells you that there is a serial killer in the city: several corpses wrapped in plaster were found recently and all of them were in the form of sculptures. The main suspect is Chad Hill whose sculpture gallery was burned and the truth about the arson is being concealed for it's connected with the local authorities and, of course, money. Now he wants to avenge it. Will you manage to break off the chain of vengeance murders and stop Chad, or not?

This Collector's Edition includes:

Investigate the abduction of the governor in the Bonus Chapter!
Find all the collectibles to learn more about detective work!
Earn extra achievements solving exciting puzzles and mini-games!
Enjoy exclusive materials, such as concept art, wallpapers, and music!

data.short_description: Investigate serial crimes and city government secrets! You're the only one who can get on the trail and break the chain of murders. Are you up for the challenge?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

movies.name: Word of the Law: Death Mask Collector's Edition

data.name: Royal Legends: Marshes Curse Collector's Edition
data.detailed_description:
You are the King’s advisor, who has been sent on a mission to the small provincial town of Liberville. Recently, there has been an increase in the number of people who have gone missing. The situation is out of the control of the local authorities. The locals are very concerned, they are quite sure that it’s the fault of the Swamp Witch who has come back to avenge her death. Although... no one has ever seen her or her forest hut! So there are two questions you need to find answers to. Who abducts innocent people? And most importantly... why?

This Collector's Edition includes:

Solve mini-games, puzzles, and interesting riddles!
Enjoy bonus materials that include concept art, wallpapers, music, and more!
Gather collectibles and look for morphing objects!
Defeat the Swamp Witch ally in the Bonus Chapter!

data.short_description: The people of Libertyville are in danger! Evil and witchcraft are gaining strength to carry out an insidious plan to take over the city. Help the authorities stop the Swamp Witch and save innocent people!
